alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Southern Erie (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 9:31PM EST until January 09 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain occurring. Total ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Southern Erie and Crawford counties. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on very slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be especially careful on bridges and overpasses which may ice first.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania Turnpike Commission remind motorists to adjust speeds based on driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadway, and traffic conditions.
